2.name: Conjuration Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a Conjuration spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Minor Conjuration: Create Water
2.description: Call forth rain. It extinguishes exposed flames and forms a Water surface. (Recharge: Short rest)

6.name: Benign Transposition: Teleport
6.description: Teleport to a nearby, unoccupied space, or swap places with an ally. (Recharge: Long rest)

10.name: Focused Conjuration
10.description: Damage taken while you are Concentrating on a Conjuration spell will not break your Concentration.
